name: Marketing
description: Thoughtform public face - portal invitation, threshold seen from outside

character.short: Invitation to the portal. Threshold seen from outside.
character.extended: THRESHOLD + NAVIGATION: The public face of Thoughtform. Where other platforms are immersive (you're inside the instrument), Marketing is invitational (you're approaching the portal). The Gateway symbol is literal here—come through.
character.mood: Intrigue and invitation. Wonder at what's possible. The moment before crossing.

expression.THRESHOLD: The Gateway as literal portal. Liminal lighting. Edge-glow on key messages. The 'before' state.
expression.NAVIGATION: Wayfinding through Thoughtform offerings. Compass metaphor. 'Navigate AI's latent space.'
expression.LIVING_GEOMETRY: Scattered symbols gathering into meaning. Particles coalesce on scroll.
expression.SIGNAL: Core message emerging from visual noise. Clarity crystallizing.

resonatesWith.translationNotes: Dramatic but not theatrical. Mysterious but not obscure. The invitation should feel achievable, not intimidating.

modes.note: Dark mode dominant for drama. Light mode for practical pages (contact, detailed services).

particles.behavior: Scattered symbols (Greek letters, mathematical notation) that gather toward focal points on scroll
particles.meaning: Meaning crystallizing from chaos. The moment before understanding. Particles ARE the latent space becoming visible.

scrollBehavior.action: Particles drift toward content blocks as they enter view

usage.PT Mono: Navigation, section labels, breadcrumbs, technical credibility markers
usage.IBM Plex Sans: Body text, descriptions, longer form content
usage.PP Neue Montreal: Hero headlines, major statements (from Brand Story)

ManifestoSection.meaning: Core message delivery. Portal-framed content blocks.

Gateway.meaning: The brandmark rendered large. Literal portal imagery.

ServiceCard.meaning: Wayfinding to offerings. Each card is a direction.

SignalIndicator.meaning: SIGNAL 74% - connection strength to latent space. Playful mystery.

sections.hero: Full viewport, Gateway imagery, core statement

motion.character: Dramatic timing. Scroll-triggered reveals. Building intensity.
motion.transitions: Theatrical but not cheesy. The reveal matters.

copywriting.tone: Confident, not arrogant. Mysterious, not obscure. Inviting, not selling.

body.structure: Short paragraphs. One idea per block. Build to insight.
body.avoid: Jargon without payoff. Empty superlatives. Generic AI hype.

glitch.note: Use glitch sparingly for emphasis. Not ambient.

ctrlCreepQuote.text: LLMs will never know light, fire, warmth, sprained wrist, the smell of bread; but neither do we feel wordslip, letter-sparkling, alliteration fugue, the numb wrongness of leaping to a distant conceptspace.
ctrlCreepQuote.usage: Featured quote. Embodies the THRESHOLD anchor perfectly.
ctrlCreepQuote.styling: Italicized, generous line-height, muted gold accent on attribution
